metadata.title: CVE-2023-2251 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
Uncaught Exception in GitHub repository eemeli/yaml prior to 2.0.0-5.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-2251` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-yaml - 2.3.4-1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-yaml package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.3.4-1build1').
